Name: Jhon Tatto
description:
Jhon is a hardworking man who is 40 years old. He lives with his partner and two children in the town of Chala, which is located in Arequipa. Jhon is a coastal fisherman who conducts his work around his town. His primary customers are his neighbors.

Jhon is requesting a microloan to buy seaweed so that he can increase his production. In the future, he hopes to make improvements to his house and provide a good education for his children.
